ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: MapInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: Map initialization with {0} or more entries must be formatted with each entry on its own line for better readability
rule.description: Map initializations with a minimum number of entries (configurable via minEntries property) must be formatted with each entry on its own line to improve readability and maintainability. Maps with fewer entries may remain on a single line.

property.name: minEntries
property.description: Minimum number of map entries required for multi-line formatting
